title: CodeLocation
description: The location within some source code.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

source.description: The source of the code, a file path, label or URL.

startLine.description: The 1-based index if the first line on which the error occurred.

startColumn.description: The 1-based index if the first column on which the error occurred.

endLine.description: The 1-based index if the last line on which the error occurred.

endColumn.description: The 1-based index if the last column on which the error occurred.
